forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low near 5C. NNW winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 39F. NNW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
